original_title: Невероятное пари, или Истинное происшествие, благополучно завершившееся сто лет назад
overview: A young student and a rich banker make a bet for two million rubles. On the condition of the wager, the student was to spend 15 years in solitary confinement.
title: Incredible Bet, or True Event That Ended Happily Hundred Years Ago
